org.openimaj.util.tree

Class IncrementalIntKDTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.util.tree.IncrementalIntKDTree

  • public class IncrementalIntKDTree
extends Object
    Implementation of a simple incremental KDTree for int[]s. Includes support for range search, neighbour search, and radius search. The tree created by this class will usually be rather unbalanced.

    The KDTree allows fast search for points in relatively low-dimension spaces.

    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • findNearestNeighbour

        public ObjectDoublePair<int[]> findNearestNeighbour(int[] query)
        Find the nearest neighbour. Only one neighbour will be returned - if multiple neighbours share the same location, or are equidistant, then this might not be the one you expect.
        Parameters:
        query - query coordinate
        Returns:
        nearest neighbour

      • radiusDistanceSearch

        public List<ObjectDoublePair<int[]>> radiusDistanceSearch(int[] centre,
                                                          int radius)
        Find all the points within the given radius of the given point. Returns the distance to the point as well as the point itself. Distance is the squared L2 distance.
        Parameters:
        centre - the centre point
        radius - the radius
        Returns:
        the points and distances
